action.name: New folder with selection
action.command: NEW_FOLDER="untitled folder";i=1;while [ -e "$NEW_FOLDER" ]||[ -L "$NEW_FOLDER" ];do ((++i));NEW_FOLDER="untitled folder $i";done;NEW_FOLDER="$(zenity --entry --text="New folder with selection" --entry-text="$NEW_FOLDER")"&&{ OUTPUT="$(mkdir "$NEW_FOLDER" 2>&1&&mv -n %F "$NEW_FOLDER/" 2>&1)"||zenity --error --no-wrap --text=$'Error creating new folder with selection:\n\n'"$OUTPUT";}
action.description: Send one or more items to a new folder

action.name: Combine selected PDF files
action.command: combine(){ [ "$#" -ge "2" ]||return 1;zenity --question --no-wrap --title="Combine selected PDF files" --text="Merge the $# PDFs you've selected into a new one called $(basename "$1"|sed -E 's/\.[^.]+$//')? If there are no errors, originals will be moved to trash."&&{ OUTPUT="$(pdf-combine.sh "$@" 2>&1)"||zenity --error --no-wrap --text="Error combining the selected PDF files: $OUTPUT";} };combine %F
action.description: Merge two or more PDFs into one

action.name: Open in terminal
action.description: Open a terminal in this directory

action.name: Open in terminal
action.description: Open a terminal in the containing directory

action.name: Open in Sublime Merge
action.description: Open Sublime Merge in this directory

action.name: Open in Sublime Merge
action.description: Open Sublime Merge in the containing directory

action.name: Find in this folder
action.description: Search for files within this folder
